main.name: Vahid Jahanbakhsh
main.bio: A software developer with over a decade of experience in software development and engineering, who is familiar with a wide variety of programming techniques and technologies. I am always passionate about keeping myself up to date with the latest technologies coming on the market and dedicated to working in the software industry. I am a troubleshooter and problem solver by nature and this is always a big help for me to sort out many difficult problems. In recent years I have been working as a senior software engineer at different companies such as MTN Irancell, Carane Enterprise Resource Planning, TickTeb, Narvan etc.
main.contactmessage: please fill the form below if you want to contact me.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: The coursework involved in information technology master's degree was comprise elements of telecommunications, information security, software development, decision support systems, business information systems and networking

Studying toward my bachelor's in computer science I trained to develop computer software, write code in multiple programming languages, and solve computing problems. During the bachelor's program, I could specialize in areas like data analytics, software engineering, and information security.

work.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
work.description: I was part of a great team in MTN Irancell, and we managed to deliver one of the best in the market Customer Lifecycle Management system for telecommunication industry.
highlights: Lead the team to design and develop enterprise applications to fulfill requirements of internal and external customers
Design a robust architecture for CLM system to handle millions of users and several billions of CDR records
Design and implement MyIrancell application; MTN Irancell's self-care application
.Net, HTML5, WebAPI 2, MVVM, Angular, Oracle, Microsoft Identity 2.0, OAuth

work.title: Full Stack Developer
highlights: Develop, validate and communicate modeling solutions, including both relational and dimensional models to implement and use of new/existing BI software tools and systems
Design, test, and document all new or modified enterprise applications.
Design and develop application front-end using client side javascript frameworks like angularjs
Performance and memory usage optimization of enterprise applications
C# .Net, HTML5, WebAPI 2, MVVM, angularjs, Oracle, Microsoft Identity 2.0, OAuth

work.title: Senior Software Developer
highlights: Developing an ERP solution using .NET and Windows Forms
Framework design, Workflow design and performance optimization
C# .Net, WinForms, Oracle, CaraneFramework (an Oracle based ORM designed and developed from scratch)

work.title: Junior Software Developer
highlights: Developing an MIS system as Windows Application
Working with source control systems like TFS
Analyzing business requirements and designing solution based on them
Linq-to-SQL as a basis for development

projects.title: My Irancell
projects.category: A selfcare application for MTN Irancell subscribers, based on NativeScript and Angular

projects.title: TickTeb
projects.category: An application for requesting and serving homecare services, based on AngularJS and .Net
A USSD application to purchase airtime and internet packages of all active telecom operators in Iran

testimonials.text: Vahid is a technically gifted team player. He understands the fundamentals of business insights and is aided by understanding a wide range of software technology. Absolute pleasure to work with.
testimonials.user: Athenkosi Mase, COO at Simplus Innovations

testimonials.text: It’s rare that you come across standout talent like Vahid. Vahid is highly skilled in programming and in other words he's an amazing programmer. He has great skill in analysis and able to solve problems carefully. Vahid’s ability to juggle multiple programming languages was unlike any I’ve seen before. In the end, Vahid would be an asset to any team.
testimonials.user: Ali Yazdani, Senior Cyber Security Engineer at Deposit Solutions
